name: Scggiapi
tagline: Steam current game & game inventory API python script
body:
# SCGGIAPI

SCGGIAPI also known as Steam current game & game inventory API is a python script written by Liam Stanley & Allen Lydiard

The script fetches information from Steam's web API and outputs the information fetched into a text file containing HTML tags.As well it fetches information from metascore such as the rating and game's description and puts it in a database and updates it every month so it does not have to keep fetching it everytime the script is run.

It fetches the following information from the Steam Web API:

appid

total playtime

app name

profile name

profile url

profile picture

game logo

current game

Requirements

Python 2.79 sudo apt-get install python2.7

relativedelta sudo pip install python-dateutil --upgrade

Steam API Key Obtain one here

The next few items are optional but were used in displaying the output on the site

optional - bootstrap

optional - jquery 1.9x +

optional - php sudo apt-get install php5

optional - font awesome

optional - derp.js (used for tooltips)

Examples
